title: IF-LOF
description: Isolation Forest - Local Outlier Factor: Uses a 3 step process - Building an isolation forest, pruning the forest with a computed treshhold, and applies local outlier factor to the resulting dataset
authors: Cheng, Zhangyu and Zou, Chengming and Dong, Jianwei

parameters.name: n_trees
parameters.description: Number of trees in isolation forest

parameters.name: max_samples
parameters.description: The number of samples to draw from X to train each tree: `max_samples * X.shape[0]`. If unspecified (`null`), then `max_samples=min(256, X.shape[0])`.

parameters.name: n_neighbors
parameters.description: Number neighbors to look at in local outlier factor calculation

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.description: Scalar that depends on consideration of the dataset and controls the amount of data to be pruned

parameters.name: m
parameters.description: m features with highest scores will be used for pruning
